item.title: Valve
item.description: Possible Combinations The combination of Active and InUse Characteristics will determine what the Home.app shows for the valve item. Here is a table showing all (known) combinations: Active InUse Home.app shows 0 0 Off 0 1 Stopping 1 0 Idle 1 1 Running Examples These examples are meant to be copied into your Node-RED system and adapted to your setup.
